programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep21
programme.desc: Water - The Dinotrux crew builds an aqueduct to bring water back to the Flatirons during a drought, but D-Structs tries to sabotage their plan.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer In Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Misadventureland Part 1 / Misadventureland Part 2 - Richie brings Lotta’s dream of a Horn-A-World theme park to life -- complete with actual Horn-A-Corns! But the reality is a bit of a nightmare.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Lucky And The Impatient Patient - While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Deja Flu / Crackridge Live - It's Archibald to the rescue when Loy, Sage and Finly come down with a bad case of the Déjà Flu. Archibald and Cousin Ashley take over the airwaves.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep47
programme.desc: No Age Like The Present / So Garfelt - Oh creates a boov-tech machine that makes Tip and Lucy the same age/When Tip is fired from Garbage, she gets a new job at Garfeldt's fish stand

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night Of The White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep25
programme.desc: Cleo & Zaid - Cleo and Zaid finally find the Uta Tablet, but the people guarding it want Cleo to stay and be their Queen. Which, like, is definitely not the worst offer she's ever gotten.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Village’s babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep21
programme.desc: Spell - As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep22
programme.desc: Secret Agent Sherman/Alexander Cartwright - When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 1 - When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army

Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert & The Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert And The Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat'S Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi'S Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep2
programme.desc: Disarmed & Dangerous / Frankenleftovers - Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment—to create life!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep65
programme.desc: Lions' Pride, Part 2 - Voltron must battle the biggest and baddest Robeast yet before it is drained of its Quintessence

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep22
programme.desc: House Of The Future / Dr. Buttersocks - Loy upgrades the house with a few seemingly helpful robotic enhancements. Archibald becomes a sock-puppet wrestling superstar.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise Of The Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Apple Of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep23
programme.desc: Croodtopia/Hand On A Hard Egg - When the adults come down with the sneezles, the kids (including Lerk and Womp) use the chance to create their own society ("you-topia") with no rules, but Eep and Thunk disagree on how to run it/Food is scarce and when a large egg is spotted on the hunting field, Grug, Eep, Snoot, Munk and Squawk call dibbs. It's decided that whoever is tough enough to be the last holding on, wins the food.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep47
programme.desc: No Age Like The Present / So Garfelt - Oh creates a boov-tech machine that makes Tip and Lucy the same age/When Tip is fired from Garbage, she gets a new job at Garfeldt's fish stand

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile… but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! …. All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some… but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhelpful Queen - One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep18
programme.desc: The Case Of The Mystery Artist - There's a mystery in Toyland! All the toys have drawn pictures of Deltoid but they've all been scribbled on and ruined! Noddy opens the investigation to find out who is the mystery artist. Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! Noddy suggests that they draw pictures again – and this time Deltoid can draw his own picture too. Clever Noddy's saved the day!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica... In Color - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep48

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Rupert & The Hilarious Hiccups - Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda are playing in the forest when Freddy and Freda spot a colourful box dropped by a travelling salesman. They open it expecting to find sandwiches or even a cake but get more than they expected when hiccups jump out of the box instead. They try to run away from the hiccups but crash into the travelling salesman and his colourful cart and upset a box of yawns and a box of giggling noises too. Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda discover that the noises are very infectious and come up with a plan to help the travelling salesman capture the naughty noises again. Greedy Freddy and Freda still haven't learnt their lesson. They find the remainder of the Elf's lunch and guzzle it all up only to catch the hiccups for real and learn that they need to be less greedy in future.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Rupert And The Snowglobe - When Rupert, Bill and Ping-Pong arrive at the beach one sunny day they are amazed to find a small snowstorm raging over one distinct area. Jack Frost emerges and explains that he has come early this year because he wants to catch some sun. He shows them the snowglobe he uses to control the icy storm. The friends play in the snow unaware that Ming has got hold of the snowglobe and is shaking it up, causing the storm to grow out of control....

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky'S Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep79
programme.desc: Fifi'S Filmshow - Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep80
programme.desc: Pip And The Genie - Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep3
programme.desc: Bully For You / The Ra Animator - Bully For You When Casper decides he can't take any more of Thatch's nastiness, he forms a secret squad dedicated to putting an end to bullying. The Ra-minator Using the power of invisibility, Casper offers to help transform Ra from a sports zero to an athletic hero.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Great Race / Pups Take the Cake - It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest. // Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus Celebration - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save the Critters - Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Big Face in Space - The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Forever Young - The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Tracker Joins the Pups! - Ryder and the pups are on their way to the jungle to help Carlos move a massive relic to the museum when he falls into a deep pit. Carlos is saved by a big eared pup named Tracker. For his bravery Tracker is made an honorary member of the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep322
programme.desc: The Pups Winter Wonder Show - The Adventure Bay Snow-Show is in trouble when Mayor Humdinger escapes with the feature act: Cap’n Turbot’s performing penguins. It’s up to the Paw Patrol, with the help of Tracker, to save the day so that the show can go on!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pirate Pups to the Rescue - Carlos and Tracker get stranded on an island in the search for buried treasure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep159
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg / Pups Save Bedtime - Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks. // The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Big Face in Space - The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Fogzilla! - It's Lighthouse Keeper Deema's birthday! But when a monster named Fogzilla keeps blowing out her lighthouse, she needs to figure out how to get Captain Molly's ship, carrying her birthday cake, to shore, or there won't be a party!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep617
programme.desc: The Snow Spectacular - Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Great Race / Pups Take the Cake - It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest. // Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Big Face in Space - The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington And The Meteor Shower - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Construction Contest - To compete in the Axle City Construction Contest, Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles! But when Crusher sends them far away, it'll take all of their construction skills combined to make it back before time runs out.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Quest for the Crown - Chase and the team are called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Royally Spooked! / Pups Save Monkey-Dinger - Another Mission PAW to Barkingburg! The Princess thinks she's seen a ghost, and the PAW Patrol needs to get to the bottom of it. // While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Pups Save the Royal Throne - Sweetie plans Sweetie plans to steal the actual royal throne, so she can rule.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Pups Save a Royal Concert / Mission PAW: Pups Save the Princess' Pals - Luke Stars goes missing before his Royal Concert in Barkingburg and Sweetie attempts to take over the Concert! // Animals are over running Barkingburg Castle while the Princess is away. It's up to Ryder and the Paw Patrol to get them under control!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep162
programme.desc: Stuck - Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbababies' Birthday - It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Big Face in Space - The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Bigfoot Crossing! - On the hottest day of the year, it's Park Rangers Goby and Gil's job to make sure that pedestrians can make it safely to the lake to swim. But when Bigfoot swipes the park's stop signs, will anyone be able to cross the road for a dip?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep212
programme.desc: What I Like About Blue - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, mountain, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia - When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Cap’n Turbot’s boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. // Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it’s up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep107
programme.desc: Straws - Big straws appear in Teletubbyland and Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa-Laa and Po wonder what to do with them. The Teletubbies blow through the straws to make colourful bubbles.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep12
programme.desc: Tractor - Dee encourages a friend to say 'tractor' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see all sorts of tractors - a blue tractor, a pulling tractor, a stuck in the mud tractor and an on a farm tractor.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep67
programme.desc: Sunflower Beanstalk - One of Logi-Po's plants has grown too big for the HQ... and it's still growing...

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep12
programme.desc: It's Time for a Family Barbecue - JoJo and Gran Gran have a barbecue with their extended family, including Mummy, Daddy, Great-Gran Gran, Auntie Dee, Uncle Tyrell and Cousin Lexi.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Happy Ordinary Day - Monty is in the mood for celebrating and begins to wonder if you really can only celebrate big, special occasions.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: Cubby House - Monty is disappointed to find the cubby house Stan built him is empty inside, until he begins to fill it with his imagination.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Mount Mumandad - Bingo and Bluey have five minutes to bed, just enough time to race to the summit of Mount Mumandad. But for them, facing powerful storms, avalanches and stinky spots will take teamwork.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Drawing Badge - It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Hollywood, USA - After winning a part in a Hollywood film, Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan to finish a scene.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep52
programme.desc: Sami Reindeer Herding, Norway - The Go Jetters are in snowy Norway to learn about the Sami reindeer. The reindeers are migrating and need to get a ferry to their warmer summer home.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Camping - While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep42
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - It's time for a family game of hide and seek. Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: Andy and The Sand Grouse - Andy takes to his safari mobile and jets off to the Kalahari Desert in Africa. His mission; to find out how sand grouse chicks drink water.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Building Machines - Motorcycle rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that all help us build things!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep21
programme.desc: The Slimy Seaworm - Captain Captain discovers that someone (or something) has been eating her sandwiches and leaving a trail of yellow slime.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Tag's First Day - The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep51
programme.desc: Ilulissat, Greenland - Grandmaster Glitch has travelled to Ilulissat in Greenland to show his teddy, Cuddles, the sights. But Cuddles ends up getting stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The Go Jetters have travelled to Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite National Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep6
programme.desc: Flash Bang Wallop - A photographer is to take pictures of the engines for a book and Thomas is determined to get in more photographs than Gordon.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep22
programme.desc: Parasol Show - Umbrella is nervous about meeting up with his pen pal at the Parasol Show, so Sarah & Duck accompany him.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep21
programme.desc: Duck Hotel - Duck wins a trip for two to a rather exciting hotel, and he finds that he settles in much quicker than Sarah.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: Cooking Up a Storm - Nelly and Nora have to get everything indoors before the big storm arrives.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: But I Am An Alligator - Dressing up is one of Lola's favourite things to do. And now she has a new alligator costume, she is never going to take it off, not ever!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Sleep - The friends find a fun slide to play on, only to realise that it is in fact a sleeping dinopaw!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: The Thing That Wobbled - Gewn, Tony and Bob find a valley of carefully balanced rocks, and Gwen is forced to learn that pride comes before the fall.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: Mums and Dads - When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water, even though it makes a mess. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.desc: Roly's First Day - As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.desc: Ros Childs brings you the top stories of the morning and the latest news as it happens. We cross to ABC News reporters on the scene across Australia and around the globe plus media conferences and analysis from expert guests.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep239
programme.desc: Watch what happens as the day unfolds. Karina Carvalho brings you the top stories, breaking news, original reporting plus the latest details and special guests to keep you informed and up to date on the issues that matter.

programme.title: Play School Ep34
programme.desc: Luke and Zindzi program a train robot, build a pizza box tower, tell the story of 'Mr Round's New House' and paint a rainbow mural. Through the windows we experiment with strong shapes.

programme.title: Brainbuzz Ep196
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Kell and Clare are challenged to build a Rollercoaster! This episode takes all the twists and turns. We talk to the experts to see how we can make our very own BrainBuzz Rollercoaster. Pass or fail, you be the judge.

programme.title: Boyer Lecture 2022: Noel Pearson
programme.desc: Indigenous community leader, lawyer, academic and land rights activist Noel Pearson reflects on "Who we were and who we can be", in his 2022 Boyer Lecture.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One Ep7
programme.desc: Megan Davis is widely considered one of the architects of the Uluru Statement from the Heart. One of the driving forces behind an Indigenous Voice to Parliament, Megan talks about fairness, recognition and rugby league.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep224
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep239
programme.desc: Kirsten Aiken brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: The Drum Ep224
programme.desc: In this ever-changing world, turn to Ellen Fanning and a panel of informed minds for forthright and insightful conversations on the day's news, big issues, local topics and unique personal insights on the issues that matter.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep239
programme.desc: Australians turn to ABC News when news breaks at home or abroad. Lorna Dunkley presents the day's top stories, latest news and information, exclusive investigations and reports from respected journalists across the nation.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep196
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson and the 7.30 team deliver insightful public affairs journalism, providing scrutiny of those in power, in-depth reporting on the biggest stories of the day, newsmaking interviews and special investigations.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep244
programme.desc: Lorna Dunkley brings you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and global news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: The Business Ep180
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, updating you on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Elysse Morgan. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep244
programme.desc: Australia's most trusted source of independent news, ABC News connects all Australians with the latest news, original reporting, reliable information and analysis to keep you informed and up-to-date. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Australia's Remote Islands Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Macquarie Island is half way between Australia & Antarctica. Home to a research base for Australia's Antarctic division. Its other inhabitants range from inquisitive penguins, to seals, to seabirds.

programme.title: The World Ep244
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: A Wild Ride: 30 Years of Foreign Correspondent
programme.desc: Celebrating 30 years, we chronicle the extraordinary changes that have shaped our world. Correspondents talk about being on the ground reporting history - from revolution, war, tragedy, terror, survival and hope.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep244
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of the day's top stories and the latest news. Michael Tetlow brings you a complete snapshot of what's happening in the cities, suburbs and regional communities.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: Sticking to the bottom of ships, barnacles are a nuisance of the sea. But they have nutritional value and strong adhesives. We'll see how researchers are revealing the amazing powers of barnacles.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Thai winemaker Visootha Lohitnavy is attracting attention from the world for her authentic wine production in the tropics. Is there a hint here for sustainable winemaking in the age of global warming?

programme.title: Dive In Tokyo
programme.desc: This time, we investigate Kandagawa, or the Kanda River. James Farrer (Professor, Sophia University) tracks the river to find out how it took shape. Join us as we tell the secret story of Kandagawa.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24

programme.title: Fishing Crazy
programme.desc: In Ise Shima, an angler employs an elaborate strategy to deceive and catch his beloved blackhead seabream. He shapes bait into a ball of paste in which he hides live bait. Join us to see how it works!

programme.title: Dig More Japan
programme.desc: Young people give their all for both society's benefit and their own. Let's dig a little deeper into some of the challenges they take on.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Kyoto City University of Arts, founded in 1880, has produced leading painters in the art world. Its policy emphasizes Shasei: painting from life through intensive observation.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Thompson vs Holland
programme.desc: Main Event - In the midst of a run up the welterweight ladder after an impressive middleweight run, Kevin “Trailblazer” Holland continues his crowd pleasing march to the top on December 3rd as he faces perennial contender Stephen “Wonderboy” Thompson in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at Amway Center in Orlando. Making his debut in the Sunshine State, South Carolina’s Thompson is one of the elite strikers in the UFC, but that’s just the kind of fight Texas’ Holland craves, setting the stage for a memorable night in the Octagon’s return to Florida. Plus, top five heavyweights go head-to-head as Australian knockout artist Tai Tuivasa looks to stop the surging Sergei Pavlovich, who is riding the momentum of four straight victories in the Octagon
